data.text: Ɓɛnzamɛn nuiti, à ʋela, wo ɠula Zeluzalɛme ʋa!
Gè koloɠologa, Siyɔn anzalopoi, pagai, zaalamai!
Nuiti ta ʋa pɔ bɛ eɠɛ baala makɛ nuiti,
Ta zezezu, ti ɠɛ ma: «À ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛ,
À wuzeɠe, ade so ga kpidii,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii wooi ɠaa:
Eɠɛʋelei kɔlɔyeɠei a ɗa ziɛi ʋili da,
Va bu, è ʋa ɠima, ɗa ʋe Zeluzalɛme,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii wooi ɠaa:
Ɓɛ ɠa nà ɓɔɛ pɔ,
Nɔ̀un tetema, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI,
Ta-ʋɛlɛiti ta ɠɛ ga nu ɠiligaa tɔnɔ,
«Mazɔlɔɔ é zo ɓolomadɔɠɔiti ma, é li seizumaanɛgiti pɔ,
Ta nà-nuɓusɛiti ta-ʋalai ɠaaʋɛ nɔ zalezu,
Ta unfesu nɛi ɓaa ga kɔzɔba vaiti ti ɠɛɛni?
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Gè ada makɛ nuiti seiɗa wo zaama, ti ɠɛni wo ma:
Naa ɠa é ba, ee, zii ɠiligiti, à woilo gòoi ma!
Zou, woilo!
Leeni ɠa gè kɛɛzu ga ansansegi
Naa ɠa é ba, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Ta-zalaʋusuiti ta mɛɛinti gaalɛɛzu ta kpɛɛinti.
Gi naama wooi mɛnigai ma,
À mina li ɓalaɠai zu,
Nà-nuɓusɛiti, à saa wɔlɔ wo seɠei ɠili zaama,
«Wɛlɛ, Zelemi, gè è logɛ eɠɛ nui é kɔlui ʋɛtɛsu,
Ta ga nuiti ti ɓakagai, ti vɔɔnɛ,
Fuulɛi ɠa ɗa ɓokolo, é fiilɛi ʋu,
Ta loli ga walii maayo ge la laani,
